```scss
// Property: activationMode
// Description: Selects how to activate the application.
// Component(s): Ti.App.iOS.UserNotificationAction
'.activation-mode-background': { activationMode: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_ACTIVATION_MODE_BACKGROUND }
'.activation-mode-foreground': { activationMode: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_ACTIVATION_MODE_FOREGROUND }
```
